author: jacopoc
msg: Applied patch from Ray Barlow to insert the escape tag into all fo.ftl files to avoid rendering errors caused by characters not valid for xml that are pulled from the db (OFBIZ-466).
From now on, it should be considered a good practice to wrap each fo.ftl template inside the tags:
